程序包 com.owl.downloader.io

接口 IOScheduler

  • 所有已知实现类:
    DefaultIOScheduler
    public interface IOScheduler
    Singleton class, used to manage io The implementation use selector to wait for the selectable io, use a thread pool to execute the actual io
    版本:
    1.0
    作者:
    Ricardo Evans

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 静态方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      static IOScheduler getInstance()
      Get the unique IOScheduler
      void read​(java.nio.channels.ReadableByteChannel channel, java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer, IOCallback callback)
      Read data from the given channel and put to the given buffer, call the callback once io finish (at least one byte read or io fail)
      void start()
      Start the IO scheduler so that it can accept io tasks
      void stop()
      Stop the IO scheduler, release all related resources
      void write​(java.nio.channels.WritableByteChannel channel, java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer, IOCallback callback)
      Write data from the given buffer to the given channel, call the callback once io finish (at least one byte write or io fail)

    • 方法详细资料

      • getInstance

        static IOScheduler getInstance()
        Get the unique IOScheduler
        返回:
        the unique IOScheduler

      • start

        void start()
    throws java.io.IOException
        Start the IO scheduler so that it can accept io tasks
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - if an io exception occur when initialize io

      • stop

        void stop()
   throws java.io.IOException
        Stop the IO scheduler, release all related resources
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - if an io exception occur when initialize io

      • read

        void read​(java.nio.channels.ReadableByteChannel channel,
          java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer,
          IOCallback callback)
        Read data from the given channel and put to the given buffer, call the callback once io finish (at least one byte read or io fail)

        Especially, if the given channel is a selectable channel, a selector is used to wait until the channel is ready

        参数:
        channel - the source channel
        buffer - the destination data buffer
        callback - io callback

      • write

        void write​(java.nio.channels.WritableByteChannel channel,
           java.nio.ByteBuffer buffer,
           IOCallback callback)
        Write data from the given buffer to the given channel, call the callback once io finish (at least one byte write or io fail)

        Especially, if the given channel is a selectable channel, a selector is used to wait until the channel is ready

        参数:
        channel - the destination channel
        buffer - the source data buffer
        callback - io callback
